body_html:
SOLVED

It is necessary to update both compile_nsync.sh and downloads/nsync/builds/i386.ios.c++11/Makefile with the actual system version of the iPhoneSimulator SDK. I had 10.3, which was correctly detected by the rest of the process, while nsync has the value 10.0 hardcoded

body:
**SOLVED**

It is necessary to update both compile_nsync.sh and downloads/nsync/builds/i386.ios.c++11/Makefile with the actual system version of the iPhoneSimulator SDK. I had 10.3, which was correctly detected by the rest of the process, while nsync has the value 10.0 hardcoded
